# ccc

The `ccc` package helps get information about rulings from the Colombian
Constitutional Court in a way that is convenient for quantitative
analysis.

You can install the current version from [GitHub](https://github.com/)
with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("acastroaraujo/ccc")
```

It provides two main things:

- Various convenient functions for searching and downloading rulings
  directly from the [CCC
  website](https://www.corteconstitucional.gov.co/).

- Various built-in datasets ready for analysis.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is:

``` R
@Manual{,
  title = {ccc: Colombian Constitutional Court data for use in R},
  author = {Andrés {Castro Araújo}},
  year = {2024},
  note = {R package version 0.1.0},
  url = {https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/},
}
```

# Package index

## Ruling Datasets (32 Years)

- [`metadata`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/metadata.md)
  : Metadata
- [`citations`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/citations.md)
  : Citations
- [`docterms`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/docterms.md)
  : Document Terms

## Search

- [`ccc_search()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/ccc_search.md)
  : Buscador de Sentencias
- [`ccc_clean_dataset()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/ccc_clean_dataset.md)
  : Clean Search Data
- [`ccc_txt()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/ccc_txt.md)
  : Download Text
- [`ccc_rtf()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/ccc_rtf.md)
  : Download Text (RTF)
- [`extract_citations()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/extract_citations.md)
  : Extractor de sentencias citadas

## Misc.

- [`create_dtm()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/create_dtm.md)
  : Sparse Document-Term Matrix
- [`create_citation_adj_mat()`](https://acastroaraujo.github.io/ccc/reference/create_citation_adj_mat.md)
  : Sparse Citation Matrix
